alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 04 at 5:33AM MST until August 04 at 9:45AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Arizona, including the following county, Maricopa. * WHEN...Until 930 AM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 533 AM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Wagner Wash, Agua Fria River, Trilby Wash, Jackrabbit Wash, Corgett Wash, Waterman Wash, Beardsley Canal, Salt River, Gila River, Lum Wash and Hassayampa River. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Phoenix, Glendale, Surprise, Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, El Mirage, Tolleson, Waddell, Cashion, Sun City West, Litchfield Park, Perryville, Liberty, White Tank Mountain Park, Luke AFB, Estrella Mountain Ranch, Palo Verde, Surprise Stadium and Estrella Mountain Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
